title: Will there be a season kickoff sale?
body: There's been one for the past several season, but I haven't seen any news about on for this year. Will Riot now come out with one this year?

replies.body: I'm not seeing any special season start sale myself but it'd be good to watch the [**sales page**](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) for the quickest info on those!
